Motivations Methods
Single Person in Images Solving Depth Ambiguity ∙∙\bullet∙ Optical-aware: VI-HC [63], Ray3D [64]
∙∙\bullet∙ Appropriate feature representation: HEMlets [65]
Solving Body Structure Understanding ∙∙\bullet∙ Joint aware: JRAN [66]
∙∙\bullet∙ Limb aware: Wu et al. [67], Deep grammar network [68]
∙∙\bullet∙ Orientation keypoints: Fisch et al. [69]
∙∙\bullet∙ Graph-based: Liu et al. [70], LCN [71], Modulated-GCN [72], Skeletal-GNN [73], HopFIR [74], RS-Net [59]
Solving Occlusion Problems ∙∙\bullet∙ Learnable-triangulation [75]
∙∙\bullet∙ RPSM [76]
∙∙\bullet∙ Lightweight multi-view [77]
∙∙\bullet∙ AdaFuse [78]
∙∙\bullet∙ Bartol et al. [79]
∙∙\bullet∙ 3D pose consensus [80]
∙∙\bullet∙ Probabilistic triangulation module [31]
Solving Data Lacking ∙∙\bullet∙ Unsupervised learning: Kudo et al. [81], Chen et al. [82], ElePose [83]
∙∙\bullet∙ Self-supervised learning: EpipolarPose [84], Wang et al. [85], MRP-Net [86], PoseTriplet [58]
∙∙\bullet∙ Weakly-supervised learning: Hua et al. [87], CameraPose [47]
∙∙\bullet∙ Transfer learning: Adaptpose [88]
in Videos Solving Single-frame Limitation ∙∙\bullet∙ VideoPose3D [89]
∙∙\bullet∙ PoseFormer [90]

∙∙\bullet∙ HSTFormer [95]
∙∙\bullet∙ STCFormer [96]
Solving Real-time Problems ∙∙\bullet∙ Temporally sparse sampling: Einfalt et al. [21]
∙∙\bullet∙ Spatio-temporal sparse sampling: MixSynthFormer [97]
Solving Body Structure Understanding ∙∙\bullet∙ Motion loss: Wang et al. [98]
∙∙\bullet∙ Human-joint affinity: DG-Net [99]
∙∙\bullet∙ Anatomy-aware: Chen et al. [100]
∙∙\bullet∙ Part aware attention: Xue et al. [101]
Solving Occlusion Problems ∙∙\bullet∙ Optical-flow consistency constraint: Cheng et al. [102]
∙∙\bullet∙ Multi-view: MTF-Transformer [32]
Solving Data Lacking ∙∙\bullet∙ Unsupervised learning: Yu et al. [103]
∙∙\bullet∙ Weakly-supervised learning: Chen et al. [104]
∙∙\bullet∙ Semi-supervised learning: MCSS [105]
∙∙\bullet∙ Self-supervised learning: Kundu et al. [106], P-STMO [107]
∙∙\bullet∙ Meta-learning: Cho et al. [57]
∙∙\bullet∙ Data augmentation: PoseAug [108], Zhang et al. [109]
Multi-person Top-down Solving Real-time Problems ∙∙\bullet∙ Multi-view: Chen et al. [110]
∙∙\bullet∙ Whole body: AlphaPose [111]
Solving Representation Limitation ∙∙\bullet∙ VoxelTrack [2]
Solving Occlusion Problems ∙∙\bullet∙ Wu et al. [112]
Solving Data Lacking ∙∙\bullet∙ Single-shot: PandaNet [52]
∙∙\bullet∙ Optical-aware: Moon et al. [113]
Bottom-up Solving Real-time Problems ∙∙\bullet∙ Fabbri et al. [114]
Solving Supervisory Limitation ∙∙\bullet∙ HMOR [115]

∙∙\bullet∙ LCR-Net++ [119]
Others Single Stage ∙∙\bullet∙ Jin et al. [120]

Main ideas Methods
Template-based Naked Multimodal Methods ∙∙\bullet∙ Hybrid annotations: Rong et al. [126]
∙∙\bullet∙ Optical flow: DTS-VIBE [127]
∙∙\bullet∙ Silhouettes: LASOR [128]
∙∙\bullet∙ Cropped image and bounding box: CLIFF [129]
Utilizing Attention Mechanism ∙∙\bullet∙ Part-driven attention: PARE [130]
∙∙\bullet∙ Graph attention: Mesh Graphormer [131]
∙∙\bullet∙ Spatio-temporal attention: MPS-Net [132], PSVT [133]
∙∙\bullet∙ Efficient architecture: FastMETRO [134], Xue et al. [135]
∙∙\bullet∙ End-to-end structure: METRO [136]
Exploiting Temporal Information ∙∙\bullet∙ Temporally encoding features: Kanazawa et al. [137]
∙∙\bullet∙ Self-attention temporal: VIBE [138]
∙∙\bullet∙ Temporally consistent: TCMR [139]
∙∙\bullet∙ Multi-level spatial-temporal attention: MAED [140]
∙∙\bullet∙ Temporally embedded live stream: TePose [141]
∙∙\bullet∙ Short-term and long-term temporal correlations: GLoT [142]
Multi-view Methods ∙∙\bullet∙ Confidence-aware majority voting mechanism: Dong et al. [143]
∙∙\bullet∙ Probabilistic-based multi-view: Sengupta et al. [144]
∙∙\bullet∙ Dynamic physics-geometry consistency: Huang et al. [33]
∙∙\bullet∙ Cross-view fusion: Zhuo et al. [145]
Boosting Efficiency ∙∙\bullet∙ Sparse constrained formulation: SCOPE [146]
∙∙\bullet∙ Single-stage model: BMP [147]
∙∙\bullet∙ Process heatmap inputs: HeatER [148]
∙∙\bullet∙ Removing redundant tokens: TORE [149]
Developing Various Representations ∙∙\bullet∙ Texture map: TexturePose [150]
∙∙\bullet∙ UV map: Zhang et al. [151], DecoMR [152], Zhang et al. [153]
∙∙\bullet∙ Heat map: Sun et al. [154], 3DCrowdNet [155]
∙∙\bullet∙ Uniform representation: DSTformer [156]
Utilizing Structural Information ∙∙\bullet∙ Part-based: holopose [157]
∙∙\bullet∙ Skeleton disentangling: Sun et al. [158]
∙∙\bullet∙ Hybrid inverse kinematics: HybrIK [159], NIKI [160]
∙∙\bullet∙ Uncertainty-aware: Lee et al. [161]
∙∙\bullet∙ Kinematic tree structure: Sengupta et al. [162]
∙∙\bullet∙ Kinematic chains: SGRE [163]
Choosing Appropriate Learning Strategies ∙∙\bullet∙ Self-improving: SPIN [164], ReFit [165], You et al. [5]
∙∙\bullet∙ Novel losses: Zanfir et al. [48], Jiang et al. [166]
∙∙\bullet∙ Unsupervised learning: Madadi et al. [167], Yu et al. [50]
∙∙\bullet∙ Bilevel online adaptation: Guan et al. [168]
∙∙\bullet∙ Single-shot: Pose2UV [169]
∙∙\bullet∙ Contrastive learning: JOTR [170]
∙∙\bullet∙ Domain adaptation: Nam et al. [171]
Detailed With Clothes ∙∙\bullet∙ Alldieck et al. [172]
∙∙\bullet∙ Multi-Garment Network (MGN) [173]
∙∙\bullet∙ Texture map: Tex2Shape [174]
∙∙\bullet∙ Layered garment representation: BCNet [175]
∙∙\bullet∙ Temporal span: H4D [39]
With Hands ∙∙\bullet∙ Linguistic priors: SGNify [176]
∙∙\bullet∙ Two-hands interaction: [177]
∙∙\bullet∙ Hand-object interaction: [178]
Whole Body ∙∙\bullet∙ PROX [179]
∙∙\bullet∙ ExPose [180]
∙∙\bullet∙ FrankMocap [181]
∙∙\bullet∙ PIXIE [182]
∙∙\bullet∙ Moon et al. [183]
∙∙\bullet∙ PyMAF [184]
∙∙\bullet∙ OSX [185]
∙∙\bullet∙ HybrIK-X [186]
Template-free Regression-based ∙∙\bullet∙ FACSIMILE [187], PeeledHuman [188], GTA [189], NSF [190]
Optimization-based Differentiable ∙∙\bullet∙ DiffPhy [191], AG3D [192]
Implicit Representations ∙∙\bullet∙ PIFu [193], PIFuHD [194]
∙∙\bullet∙ Canonical space: ARCH [195], ARCH++ [196], CAR [197]
∙∙\bullet∙ Geometric priors: GeoPIFu [198]
∙∙\bullet∙ Novel representations: Peng et al. [199], 3DNBF [200]
Neural Radiance Fields ∙∙\bullet∙ Volume deformation scheme [201]
∙∙\bullet∙ ActorsNeRF [51]
Diffusion Models ∙∙\bullet∙ HMDiff [202]

NeRF + Explicit ∙∙\bullet∙ TransHuman [210]
